structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases

law.catch_line: Failure Of Trustee To Deliver Property
law.text: If a trustee refuses or neglects to deliver any property in his hands when lawfully required by the officer serving the execution, he shall, after deducting the amount of any lien he has on such property, be liable to the plaintiff in a proceeding under section forty-five.
